excerpt.rendered:
The IC-F5023/H series is ideal for small-to-mid sized systems for public safety, large industry to light commercial users.
The IC-F6023/H series offers multiple signaling, advanced scanning, improved external channel control capability and wide frequency coverage packed in acompact body. This rugged mobile easily exceeds your expectations with its reliable performance and communication
quality.
